data.title: 100 Unforgettable Last-Dance Songs to End Your Wedding
data.meta_description: Make the final moments of your special day count with an unforgettable tune. Here, we put together a list of the 100 best last-dance songs to consider for your wedding.
data.text:
You've had your first dance, cut the wedding cake, tossed the bouquet, and enjoyed all the other wedding reception festivities. Now it's time for the last dance—and you'll want to be sure that you give your guests a happy, lasting memory of that final spin around the dance floor. Luckily, when it comes to choosing a final tune for your affair, there are plenty of options to consider.

For those who want to rock, consider wrapping up the night with AC/DC's "You Shook Me All Night Long" or Queen's "Don't Stop Me Now." As for the classics, there's nothing better than selecting Donna Summer's "Last Dance" (understandably one of the most popular choices) or The Isley Brothers' "Shout." More modern dance hits are also a fantastic choice; we love "Feel So Close" by Calvin Harris and "The Time (Dirty Bit)," by The Black Eyed Peas.

If you want a private last dance with just your partner, choose a slow song to create an intimate moment and re-focus the attention on you and your new spouse. If you'd rather go out with a bang—especially if you're having an after-party—pick a high-energy tune for all your guests to enjoy.

Ahead, here are 100 of our favorite last-dance songs that will guarantee a perfect musical end to your wedding.

01 of 100

"Last Dance," by Donna Summer

Lyrics of Love: "I need you, by me/Beside me, to guide me"

02 of 100

"(I've Had) the Time of My Life," by Bill Medley and Jennifer Warnes

Lyrics of Love: "No, I never felt like this before/Yes I swear it's the truth/And I owe it all to you"

03 of 100

"Sweet Caroline," by Neil Diamond

Lyrics of Love: "Sweet Caroline/Good times never seemed so good/I'd be inclined/To believe they never would"

04 of 100

"Party Rock Anthem," by LMFAO

Lyrics of Love: "Party rock is in the house tonight/Everybody just have a good time"

05 of 100

"Don't Stop Believin'," by Journey

Lyrics of Love: "A singer in a smoky room/A smell of wine and cheap perfume/For a smile they can share the night/It goes on and on, and on, and on"

06 of 100

"Closing Time," by Semisonic

Lyrics of Love: "Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end/Yeah, I know who I want to take me home"

07 of 100

"Save the Last Dance for Me," by Michael Bublé

Lyrics of Love: "But don't forget who's takin' you home/And in whose arms you're gonna be/So darlin' save the last dance for me"

08 of 100

"The Time (Dirty Bit)," by The Black Eyed Peas

Lyrics of Love: "Let's lose control/Let's do it all night/'Til we can't do it no more"

09 of 100

"We Are Young," by Fun. featuring Janelle Monáe

Lyrics of Love: "We are young/So let's set the world on fire/We can burn brighter/Than the sun"

10 of 100

"Good Riddance (Time of Your Life)," by Green Day

Lyrics of Love: "It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right/I hope you had the time of your life"

11 of 100

"I Don't Want This Night to End," by Luke Bryan

Lyrics of Love: "And I don't know what road we're on/Or where we've been from starin' at you/Girl, all I know is I don't want this night to end"

12 of 100

"The Matrimony," by Wale featuring Usher

Lyrics of Love: "If there's a question of my heart, you've got it/It don't belong to anyone but you"

13 of 100

"Today Was a Fairytale," by Taylor Swift

Lyrics of Love: "But can you feel this magic in the air?/It must have been the way you kissed me/Fell in love when I saw you standing there"

14 of 100

"Greatest Gift," by Jorja Smith

Lyrics of Love: "You're the greatest gift I've found/My time with you is everything"

15 of 100

"Don't Stop Me Now," by Queen

Lyrics of Love: "I'm traveling at the speed of light/I wanna make a supersonic man out of you"

16 of 100

"Nice for What," by Drake

Lyrics of Love: "That's a real one in your reflection"

17 of 100

"American Pie," by Don McLean

Lyrics of Love: "Did you write the book of love/And do you have faith in God above"

18 of 100

"Forever," by Chris Brown

Lyrics of Love: "So don't be scared, I'm right here, baby/We can go anywhere, go anywhere/But first, it's your chance, take my hand, come with me"

19 of 100

"This Will Be (an Everlasting Love)," by Natalie Cole

Lyrics of Love: "This will be/An everlasting love/This will be/The one I've waited for"

20 of 100

"Shout," by The Isley Brothers

Lyrics of Love: "(Say) say that you need me/(Say) say that you want me/(Say) you wanna please me"

21 of 100

"You Shook Me All Night," by AC/DC

Lyrics of Love: "She was a fast machine/She kept her motor clean/She was the best damn woman I had ever seen"

22 of 100

"Livin' on a Prayer," by Bon Jovi

Lyrics of Love: "She says, we've got to hold on to what we've got/It doesn't make a difference if we make it or not/We've got each other and that's a lot for love"

23 of 100

"So Into You," by Tamia

Lyrics of Love: "I think you're truly something special/Just what my dreams are really made of"

24 of 100

"Bohemian Rhapsody," by Queen

Lyrics of Love: "Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?"

25 of 100

"What a Wonderful World," by Louis Armstrong

Lyrics of Love: "I see skies of blue and clouds of white/The bright blessed day, the dark sacred night/And I think to myself what a wonderful world"

26 of 100

"Piano Man," by Billy Joel

Lyrics of Love: "Sing us a song tonight/Well we're all in the mood for a melody/And you got us feeling alright"

27 of 100

"One More Time," by Daft Punk

Lyrics of Love: "One more time we're gonna celebrate/Oh yeah all right don't stop the dancing"

28 of 100

"All Night Long," by Lionel Richie and Jimmy Buffett

Lyrics of Love: "Everybody sing, everybody dance/Lose yourself in wild romance, we going to/Parti', karamu', fiesta, forever"

29 of 100

"Feel So Close," by Calvin Harris

Lyrics of Love: "I wear my heart upon my sleeve, like a big deal/Your love bows down, I mean surround me like a waterfall"

30 of 100

"Glad You Came," by The Wanted

Lyrics of Love: "My universe will never be the same/I'm glad you came"

31 of 100

"Don't Stop," by Fleetwood Mac

Lyrics of Love: "All I want is to see you smile/If it takes just a little while"

32 of 100

"I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles)," by The Proclaimers

Lyrics of Love: "And I would walk 500 more/Just to be the man who walks a thousand miles/To fall down at your door"

33 of 100

"Late in the Evening," by Paul Simon

Lyrics of Love: "The first thing I remember/When you came into my life/I said I'm gonna get that girl/No matter what I do"

34 of 100

"I Will Always Love You," by Whitney Houston

Lyrics of Love: "And I will always love you/I will always love you/You my darling, you"

35 of 100

"Angels," by Robbie Williams

Lyrics of Love: "And through it all she offers me protection/A lot of love and affection/Whether I'm right or wrong"

36 of 100

"One Love," by Bob Marley

Lyrics of Love: "One love/One heart/Let's get together and feel alright"

37 of 100

"Hold On, We're Going Home," by Drake

Lyrics of Love: "I got my eyes on you/You're everything that I see/I want your hot love and emotion, endlessly"

38 of 100

"Never Forget," by Take That

Lyrics of Love: "Sometimes strolled hand in hand with love/Everybody's been there"

39 of 100

"How Sweet It Is (To Be Loved by You)," by Marvin Gaye

Lyrics of Love: "With sweet love and devotion/Deeply touching my emotion"

40 of 100

"Shut Up and Dance," by Walk the Moon

Lyrics of Love: "This woman is my destiny/She said oh oh oh/Shut up and dance with me"

41 of 100

"All You Need Is Love," by The Beatles

Lyrics of Love: "All you need is love, love/Love is all you need"

42 of 100

"Water," by Tyla

Lyrics of Love: "I can keep my cool, but tonight I'm wildin'"

43 of 100

"September," by Earth, Wind & Fire

Lyrics of Love: "Our hearts were ringing/In the key that our souls were singing/As we danced in the night/Remember how the stars stole the night away"

44 of 100

"Never Gonna Give You Up," by Rick Astley

Lyrics of Love: "Never gonna give you up/Never gonna let you down"

45 of 100

"Love On Top," by Beyoncé

Lyrics of Love: "You're the one I love/You're the one I need/You're the only one I see/Come on baby it's you"

46 of 100

"Crazy in Love," by Beyoncé featuring Jay-Z

Lyrics of Love: "'Cause I know I don't understand/Just how your love can do what no one else can"

47 of 100

"Walking on Sunshine," by Katrina & The Waves

Lyrics of Love: "I used to think maybe you loved me now baby I'm sure/And I just can't wait till the day when you knock on my door"

48 of 100

"At Last," by Etta James

Lyrics of Love: "At last my love has come along/My lonely days are over and life is like a song, oh yeah"

49 of 100

"Forever Young," by Jay-Z featuring Mr. Hudson

Lyrics of Love: "Forever young/I wanna be forever young"

50 of 100

"Uptown Funk," by Bruno Mars and Mark Ronson

Lyrics of Love: "Girls hit your hallelujah (whoo)/'Cause uptown funk gon' give it to you"

51 of 100

"History," by One Direction

Lyrics of Love: "This is not the end/We can make it you know it, you know"

52 of 100

"Marry You," by Bruno Mars

Lyrics of Love: "Is it the look in your eyes, or is it this dancing juice/Who cares baby, I think I wanna marry you"

53 of 100

"God Only Knows," by The Beach Boys

Lyrics of Love: "God only knows what I'd be without you/If you should ever leave me"

54 of 100

"Mr. Brightside," by The Killers

Lyrics of Love: "It started out with a kiss/How did it end up like this?"

55 of 100

"Take Me Home Tonight," by Eddie Money

Lyrics of Love: "Take me home tonight/I don't wanna let you go 'til you see the light"

56 of 100

"Dog Days Are Over," by Florence and the Machine

Lyrics of Love: "Happiness, hit her like a train on a track/Coming towards her, stuck still no turning back"

57 of 100

"I Don't Want to Miss a Thing," by Aerosmith

Lyrics of Love: "Don't want to close my eyes/I don't want to fall asleep/'Cause I'd miss you baby/And I don't want to miss a thing"

58 of 100

"All The Small Things," by Blink-182

Lyrics of Love: "She left me roses by the stairs/Surprises let me know she cares"

59 of 100

"Could I Have This Dance," by Anne Murray

Lyrics of Love: "I'll always remember the song they were playin'/The first time we danced and I knew/As we swayed to the music and held to each other/I fell in love with you"

60 of 100

"Stand By Me," by Ben E. King

Lyrics of Love: "No I won't be afraid, no I won't be afraid/Just as long as you stand, stand by me"

61 of 100

"The Best Is Yet to Come," by Drake White

Lyrics of Love: "Our future looks as bright as/That summer-setting sun/Oh, the best is yet to come"

62 of 100

"The Way You Look Tonight," by Frank Sinatra

Lyrics of Love: "Someday, when I'm awfully low/When the world is cold/I will feel a glow just thinking of you/And the way you look tonight"

63 of 100

"December, 1963 (Oh What a Night)," by The Four Seasons

Lyrics of Love: "Oh what a night, hypnotizin' mesmerizing me/She was everything I dreamed she'd be"

64 of 100

"Last Dance," by Dua Lipa

Lyrics of Love: "We were built to last/We were built like that/Baby take my hand/Tighten this romance"

65 of 100

"Just Can't Get Enough," by Depeche Mode

Lyrics of Love: "When I'm with you baby/I go out of my head/And I just can't get enough"

66 of 100

"I Wanna Dance With Somebody (Who Loves Me)," by Whitney Houston

Lyrics of Love: "Oh, I wanna dance with somebody/I wanna feel the heat with somebody/Yeah, I wanna dance with somebody/With somebody who loves me"

67 of 100

"You Da One," by Rihanna

Lyrics of Love: "You da one that I dream about all day/You da one that I think about always"

68 of 100

"Like a Prayer," by Madonna

Lyrics of Love: "I hear you call my name/And it feels like home"

69 of 100

"How Long Will I Love You," by Ellie Goulding

Lyrics of Love: "How long will I love you?/As long as stars are above you"

70 of 100

"Just the Way You Are," by Bruno Mars

Lyrics of Love: "When I see your face/There's not a thing that I would change/'Cause you're amazing/Just the way you are"

71 of 100

"Collide," by Howie Day

Lyrics of Love: "You finally find/You and I collide"

72 of 100

"The Edge of Glory," by Lady Gaga

Lyrics of Love: "I'm gonna run right to, to the edge with you/Where we can both fall far in love"

73 of 100

"Get Lucky," by Daft Punk

Lyrics of Love: "We've come too far to give up who we are/So let's raise the bar and our cups to the stars"

74 of 100

"Calm Down," by Rema

Lyrics of Love: "Girl, this your body e put my heart for lockdown"

75 of 100

"Dancing Queen," by ABBA

Lyrics of Love: "You're in the mood for a dance/And when you get the chance/You are the dancing queen"

76 of 100

"Thinking Out Loud," by Ed Sheeran

Lyrics of Love: "Take me into your loving arms/Kiss me under the light of a thousand stars/Place your head on my beating heart"

77 of 100

"Love Story," by Taylor Swift

Lyrics of Love: "You'll be the prince and I'll be the princess/It's a love story, baby, just say, 'Yes'"

78 of 100

"Wannabe," by Spice Girls

Lyrics of Love: "If you wanna be my lover, you gotta get with my friends/Make it last forever, friendship never ends"

79 of 100

"All of Me," by John Legend

Lyrics of Love: "Give your all to me/I'll give my all to you/You're my end and my beginning/Even when I lose I'm winning"

80 of 100

"Pour Some Sugar on Me," by Def Leppard

Lyrics of Love: "Pour some sugar on me/Ooh, in the name of love"

81 of 100

"Sweet Child O' Mine," by Guns 'N Roses

Lyrics of Love: "She's got a smile that it seems to me/Reminds me of childhood memories/Where everything was as fresh as the bright blue sky"

82 of 100

"Amazed," by Lonestar

Lyrics of Love: "I don't know how you do what you do/I'm so in love with you/It just keeps gettin' better"

83 of 100

"Hey Ya!" by Outkast

Lyrics of Love: "My baby don't mess around/Because she loves me so/This I know fo sho"

84 of 100

"Angel," by Shaggy featuring Rayvon

Lyrics of Love: "Shorty, you're my angel, you're my darling angel/Girl, you're my friend when I'm in need"

85 of 100

"Send Me on My Way," by Rusted Root

Lyrics of Love: "Well, I would like to hold my little hand/And we will run, we will, we will crawl, we will"

86 of 100

"Wonderful Tonight," by Eric Clapton

Lyrics of Love: "And the wonder of it all/Is that you just don't realize how much I love you"

87 of 100

"My Girl," by The Temptations

Lyrics of Love: "I've got sunshine on a cloudy day/When it's cold outside I've got the month of May"

91 of 100

"Chasing Cars," by Snow Patrol

Lyrics of Love: "If I lay here/If I just lay here/Would you lie with me and just forget the world?"

92 of 100

"Dancing in the Moonlight," by Toploader

Lyrics of Love: "Dancin' in the moonlight/Everybody's feeling warm and bright/It is such a fine and natural sight"

93 of 100

"Make You Feel My Love," by Adele

Lyrics of Love: "I could hold you/For a million years/To make you feel my love"

94 of 100

"If I Ain't Got You," by Alicia Keys

Lyrics of Love: "Some people want it all/But I don't want nothing at all/If it ain't you, baby"

95 of 100

"Walking on a Dream," by Empire of the Sun

Lyrics of Love: "Is it real now?/Two people become one/I can feel it/Two people become one"

96 of 100

"Let's Get Married," by Jagged Edge

Lyrics of Love: "Been feelin' you all the while, girl, I must confess (feelin' you all the while)/Girl, let's just get married"

97 of 100

"One Dance," by Drake

Lyrics of Love: "Strength and guidance/All that I'm wishing for my friends"

98 of 100

"Weak," by SWV

Lyrics of Love: "Your love is so sweet/It knocks me right off of my feet"

99 of 100

"Turn Down for What," by DJ Snake and Lil Jon

Lyrics of Love: "Another round of shots/Turn down for what?"

100 of 100

"Sit Next to Me," by Foster the People

Lyrics of Love: "I'm saying, come over here sit next to me/We can see where things go naturally"
